title: Bzetcoinn
author: Bzetcoinn
content: Sign up for BZETCOIN ( BZET ) WALLET ENCRYPTİON-OPEN SOURCE SOFTWARE-BLOCKCHAIN-QUICK TRANSACTIONSWhat is Bzetcoin?While BzetCOIN operates on the same principle as Bitcoin, there are some differences between them. It was created to address some of the flaws in the Bitcoin system and has been successful in doing so. BzetCOIN is a cryptocurrency that operates on an open-source blockchain system, which is part of the BzetMex ecosystem.It was created to enable money transfers at very low costs. Unlike the Bitcoin blockchain, BzetCOIN's blockchain system creates blocks faster, which enables faster transaction confirmations for BzetCOIN. AND MOREFollow us on our official accounts to find out about our latest announcements and updates BZETCOIN ( BZET)  Website: https://https://www.bzetcoin.com/ WEBSITE | WHITEPAPER | TELEGRAM | TWITTER | LINKEDIN | YOUTUBE  BZETCOIN WALLET ICO Sale Contact: marketing@bzetcoin.com
